p: There are also differences in the composition of EOs distilled from different organs. According to Navickiene et al. [ 38] who distilled Brazilian specimens, fruit EOs are dominated by monoterpenes (an average of 85.1%), leaf EOs are dominated by sesquiterpenes (specifically by Î²-caryophyllene), while the rare root EO contains mainly monoterpenes but at lower level than fruits (an average of 66.9%).
